query:
CREATE 
    (se:Career {name: 'Software Engineer'}),
    (ds:Career {name: 'Data Scientist'}),
    (fe:Career {name: 'Frontend Developer'}),
    (be:Career {name: 'Backend Developer'}),
    (ml:Career {name: 'ML Engineer'}),

    (python:Skill {name: 'Python'}),
    (java:Skill {name: 'Java'}),
    (js:Skill {name: 'JavaScript'}),
    (sql:Skill {name: 'SQL'}),
    (mlskill:Skill {name: 'Machine Learning'}),
    (dsa:Skill {name: 'Data Structures & Algorithms'}),
    (cloud:Skill {name: 'Cloud Computing'}),

    (cs101:Course {name: 'Introduction to Computer Science'}),
    (mlcourse:Course {name: 'Machine Learning Basics'}),
    (webdev:Course {name: 'Web Development'}),
    (dbms:Course {name: 'Database Management Systems'}),
    (cloudcert:Course {name: 'AWS Cloud Practitioner'}),

    (aws_cert:Certification {name: 'AWS Certified Developer'}),
    (gcp_cert:Certification {name: 'Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer'}),
    (ml_cert:Certification {name: 'ML Engineer Certification'}),

    (it:Industry {name: 'IT'}),
    (finance:Industry {name: 'Finance'}),
    (healthcare:Industry {name: 'Healthcare'}),
    (ecommerce:Industry {name: 'E-Commerce'}),

    (se)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(python),
    (se)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(java),
    (se)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(dsa),
    (ds)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(python),
    (ds)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(sql),
    (ds)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(mlskill),
    (fe)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(js),
    (fe)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(webdev),
    (be)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(java),
    (be)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(sql),
    (be)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(cloud),
    (ml)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(mlskill),
    (ml)-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(python),

    (python)-[:CAN_BE_LEARNED_FROM]->(cs101),
    (mlskill)-[:CAN_BE_LEARNED_FROM]->(mlcourse),
    (webdev)-[:CAN_BE_LEARNED_FROM]->(webdev),
    (sql)-[:CAN_BE_LEARNED_FROM]->(dbms),
    (cloud)-[:CAN_BE_LEARNED_FROM]->(cloudcert),

    (se)-[:CAN_WORK_IN]->(it),
    (se)-[:CAN_WORK_IN]->(ecommerce),
    (ds)-[:CAN_WORK_IN]->(finance),
    (ds)-[:CAN_WORK_IN]->(healthcare),
    (ml)-[:CAN_WORK_IN]->(it),
    (ml)-[:CAN_WORK_IN]->(healthcare),

    (se)-[:BENEFITS_FROM_CERTIFICATION]->(aws_cert),
    (ds)-[:BENEFITS_FROM_CERTIFICATION]->(gcp_cert),
    (ml)-[:BENEFITS_FROM_CERTIFICATION]->(ml_cert);
